ingredients.ingredient: 1 ½ lb ; russet potato, peeled ; (680 g)
¾ cup ; shredded sharp cheddar cheese ; (75 g)
½ cup ; French Crispy Fried Onions ; (50 g)

steps.step: Preheat waffle iron on high. Spray iron with cooking spray. Evenly spread half of the potato batter in the waffle iron and close. Cook for 5–7 minutes until nicely browned.
Using a fork, remove hash-brown waffle from iron. Cook the second waffle using the rest of the potato batter.
